job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in IT or a related field

jd: From: Ravina, Vyze Inc ravina@vyzeinc.com Reply to: ravina@vyzeinc.com Job Description -PV will take 30 min video screening callMongo Database AdministratorRemote + Some Travel to Reading, Pennsylvania and If not local to Reading, Pennsylvania, the consultant will be required to travel onsite roughly 30% of the time. Requirements: • Bachelor's degree in and IT or a related field.• 3+ years' experience designing business solutions in a hybrid cloud environment (AWS and/or Azure)• 10+ years Progressive years of experience in database technologies.• 5+ years extensive experience with Mongo Db Atlas and Vector database technologies• 5+ years' Experience with cloud databases and cloud services (AWS, Microsoft Azure).• Strong command of SQL, PowerShell, and Unix shell scripting skills.• Strong experience in SQL tools such as TOAD, SQL Developer, PGADMIN, Mongo CLI, Mongo DB Compass etc.• Advanced knowledge of database security, backup and recovery, and performance monitoring standards.• Understanding relational and dimensional data modeling• Experience in database migrations, upgrades.• An ideal candidate should have experience in modern ways of designing, building, optimizing and deployment of database workloads in public cloud, preferably Mongo Db Atlas and Vector database technologies.• Should be experienced in schema design and data modeling.• Should be a driver in determining, implementing, and continuously improving the architecture and the security aspect throughout the systems, tools and workflows.• Always striving for automation with distinctly unique mindset for optimization of database infrastructure working with an international (onsite and offshore) team.• Strong written and verbal communication skills with the ability to create and present concepts and recommendations to the management.• Experience with database technologies (MongoDB, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, Aurora, MYSQL, Snowflake & DocumentDB & Vector DBs).Must Have Requirements:• 5+ years extensive experience with Mongo Db Atlas and Vector database technologies• 5+ years' experience with cloud databases and cloud services, and Hybrid environments (AWS, Microsoft Azure).• Strong command of SQL, PowerShell, and Unix shell scripting skills.• Strong experience in SQL tools such as TOAD, SQL Developer, PGADMIN, Mongo CLI, Mongo DB Compass etc.• Advanced knowledge of database security, backup and recovery, and performance monitoring standards.• Understanding relational and dimensional data modeling• Experience in database migrations, upgrades.• Should be experienced in schema design and data modeling.Added Bonus If Candidates Have• Master's degree in an IT or related field• MongoDb/Cloud Architecture certifications• Experience with SOX/SOC1/SOC2 and other Compliance Audits• Knowledge of SAS model• VPC Pairing, Private/Public Links, network connectivity & security•
